菍拼音niè,rěn。是一个汉语字，基本意思是古书上说的一种草。古同“棯”，枣树的一种。
菍 pinyin niè,rěn. It is a Chinese character, which basically means a kind of grass in ancient books. In ancient times, "棯", a kind of jujube.

菍字的基本解释

菍
niè
古书上说的一种草。

菍
rěn
古同“棯”，枣树的一种。

菍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》奴結切，入屑，泥。］
草名。
[②]［rěn］
［《集韻》忍甚切，上，日。］
同“棯1”。
果木名。枣树的一种。

菍字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菍； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1037第15
【唐韻】奴結切，音涅。草也。　又【集韻】忍甚切，音稔。木名。

菍字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
菍字的起名意思

古书上说的一种草。

菍
Basic explanation of words
菍
niè
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
菍
rěn
In ancient times, "棯" is a kind of jujube.
菍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" slave knot cutting, into the crumbs, mud. ]
Cursive name.
[②] [rěn]
["Jiyun" tolerate everything, go on, on day. ]
Same as "棯1".
Fruit tree name. A kind of jujube tree.
菍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菍; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1037 15
[Tang Yun] Slave knot cutting, sound nirvana. Grass also.　[Jiyun] To endure everything, sound Minoru. Wooden name.
